questions.text: The family had three minutes to get where they were going in the opening scene. Where was it they were going?
options: To get to the park before all the good spots were taken
To get to school on time
To get to the movies before the trailers started
questions.explanation:
To use a 50% off coupon.

	The characters were all in the van and were headed to breakfast. They had three minutes before the coupon expired. The one son demanded that it was at least a 10 minute drive to get there. The mother took it as a challenge to get there.

questions.text: The new house has a lot of issues, what wasn't one of them?
questions.explanation:
Upstairs windows were all missing.

	The family had three kids who were all forced to stay in a single bedroom. They picked the worst house in the best neighborhood in order to get a the helk in school that their disabled son JJ needed. The house didn't have a second floor at all.

questions.text: What was wrong with the school JJ was enrolled in?
questions.correct: There was no wheelchair ramp for him.
options: The other kids hated him for being in a wheelchair.
Nothing was wrong, it was perfect in every way.
questions.explanation:
There was no wheelchair ramp for him.

	JJ was 16, confined to a wheelchair and couldn't speak out loud. The new school had an aide to go around with him so he wouldn't be stuck in special education courses. Unfortunately he had to be taken into the building through the garbage ramp.

Dr. Miller

	She was played by Marin Hinkle. She met the family outside of the school on their first day there. She was happy to announce that the school mascot had recently been changed from a viking to a seaslug.

questions.text: Which of the DiMeo children was a track star?
questions.explanation:
Dylan.

	Dylan was happy to hear that they were moving to the new district as they had just rebuilt the track. On her first day she ran a team best 58 seconds, though the exact event wasn't mentioned. She was the only girl among the DiMeo children.

questions.text: Which of the DiMeo children joined the Astronomy club at the school?
questions.explanation:
Ray.

	He met a girl, who was the only other student in the Astronomy club. The school had an entire planetarium for them to use. Ironically he was the one of the three children who was against moving to the new district at the start. Unfortunately, he found out later that his new friend already had a boyfriend.

questions.text: Who walked in on Jimmy in the shower?
questions.explanation:
Maya.

	Jimmy was the father. Maya, played by Minnie Driver, walked in on him in the shower. She was seeking his advice on what to do with Ray. After their talk she walked off with his towel.

questions.text: What did the license plate on Maya's car read?
questions.explanation:
She Nutz.

	The older police officer who stopped his younger partner from pulling her over said he'd heard that it wasn't even a vanity plate. She was so well known the police officers chose not to chase her down both times she went speeding past them.

questions.text: Who was hired to take on the role of JJ's assistant after his first one didn't work out?
questions.explanation:
Kenneth.

	Kenneth, the janitor, had already had a run-in with the Maya the morning JJ started in the new school. When he saw J.J. at the school carnival he took up the role of personal assistant. The first assistant had a funny voice and didn't get along with JJ's sense of humor.

False.

	The students tried to nominate him from the moment he wheeled into the classroom. He didn't want anything to do with it at the time, but by the end of the episode he announced at the carnival that he was going to run for the job.
